abstract: Beleaguered Bank of America shareholders pleaded Wednesday with the bank’s chief executive not to proceed with a $4 billion acquisition of distressed subprime mortgage lender Countrywide Financial.
lead_paragraph: Beleaguered Bank of America shareholders pleaded Wednesday with the bank’s chief executive not to proceed with a $4 billion acquisition of distressed subprime mortgage lender Countrywide Financial.

headline.main: Bank of America Chief Rejects Calls to Dump Countrywide Deal
